bio: Master's degree from the Federal University of Juiz de Fora since 2019. Always curious about computing, seeking to learn new languages, techniques, and tools.

experience.title: SYSTEMS ANALYST
experience.description: Fullstack development of platforms for conducting and monitoring educational assessments for multiple educational entities, from private institutions to government education ministries. The implemented platforms allow a high degree of customization through low-code implementations to meet the specific requirements of each partner. Implementation of generalized packages of components for forms, results, data filtering, and more.

experience.title: TEAM TECH LEAD
experience.description: Led projects in the areas of education and news. At Jornal do Carro and Estradão, specialized vehicle news portals, as well as at the Judicial Academy, leading the implementation of a system to promote the educational development of professionals in the judicial system of Santa Catarina state. Supported the development of trainees, architected solutions, developed and tested applications, optimized pages for speed and user experience, and conducted A/B tests.

experience.title: SOFTWARE ENGINEER
experience.description: Developed features for the SYDLE ONE communication module and resources for ProcessBox, a BPMN repository. Developed the frontend for Dog Life and the SYDLE blog.

experience.title: SOFTWARE DEVELOPER
experience.company: CEAD @ Federal University of Juiz de Fora
experience.description: Developed and maintained external software for enrolling students and tutors in courses managed by the Distance Learning Center of UFJF, and internal software for financial administration and process tracking of these courses. Occasionally developed Wordpress themes.
list: Software development in Java and PHP.
Creation of Wordpress themes with Materialize and CSS 3.

experience.title: SOFTWARE DEVELOPER
experience.description: Maintenance of pharmaceutical product quotation software and implementation of an internal Wiki.

experience.title: SOFTWARE ENGINEERING RESEARCHER
experience.company: CAPES @ Federal University of Juiz de Fora
experience.description: Researcher focused on Recommendation Systems in Software Ecosystems. The work developed is based on recommending developers for projects, considering their experience and domain knowledge within the NPM (Node Package Manager) and Github ecosystems.
list: Research on developer interactions within Software Ecosystems.
Participation in national project evaluations conducted by industry experts.

experience.title: RESEARCHER AND SOFTWARE DEVELOPER
experience.company: GETCOMP @ Federal University of Juiz de Fora
experience.description: Researcher and software developer for matching XML files to understand the evolution of files by version control systems, e.g. Git; SVN; Mercurial.

experience.title: IT INTERN
experience.description: Internship for the Industrial Informatics Technical Course.

education.title: MASTER'S IN COMPUTER SCIENCE
education.institution: PPGCC @ Federal University of Juiz de Fora
education.description: The Master's course in Computer Science prepares professionals to research, teach, and contribute to the evolution of scientific and technological knowledge in Computer Science, and to use this knowledge in evaluating, specifying, and developing new mathematical and computational models, tools, methods, and systems.

education.title: SANDWICH BACHELOR'S IN SOFTWARE ENGINEERING
education.institution: COLLEGE OF COMPUTING AND DIGITAL MEDIA @ DE PAUL UNIVERSITY (CHICAGO/USA)
education.description: The Bachelor's course in Computer Science at the Federal University of Juiz de Fora focuses on computing as the main activity and aims to train professionals with deep technical and scientific foundations in the field, capable of entering professional, academic, and scientific sectors, and contributing to the development of Brazilian society and the advancement of science and technology.

education.title: BACHELOR'S IN EXACT SCIENCES (FOCUS ON COMPUTER SCIENCE)
education.institution: DCC @ Federal University of Juiz de Fora
education.description: The Bachelor's course in Computer Science at the Federal University of Juiz de Fora focuses on computing as the main activity and aims to train professionals with deep technical and scientific foundations in the field, capable of entering professional, academic, and scientific sectors, and contributing to the development of Brazilian society and the advancement of science and technology.

education.title: TECHNICAL COURSE IN INFORMATICS INTEGRATED WITH HIGH SCHOOL
education.description: The Informatics course trains professionals to work in programming, assembling and maintaining standalone or networked computers. The professional is qualified to identify the origin of computer, peripheral, and program malfunctions; perform machine language programming; create small digital circuits to be connected to microprocessors; develop algorithms and data structures for creating applications; apply programming languages and environments in software development; and perform training and technical support actions.
